trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while processing an XSLT transformation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
The message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltException" name="XsltException" href=""></xref> class using the information in the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> objects.

The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SerializationInfo" name="SerializationInfo" href=""></xref> object containing all the properties of an <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltException" name="XsltException" href=""></xref>.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamingContext" name="StreamingContext" href=""></xref> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltException" name="XsltException" href=""></xref> class.
The description of the error condition.
The <xref:System.Exception> which threw the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltException" name="XsltException" href=""></xref>, if any.
This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Streams all the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XsltException" name="XsltException" href=""></xref> properties into the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class for the given <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SerializationInfo" name="SerializationInfo" href=""></xref> object.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamingContext" name="StreamingContext" href=""></xref> object.
Gets the line number indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
This property is used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException> class.
The line number indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
Gets the line position indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
This property is used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException> class.
The line position indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
Gets the formatted error message describing the current exception.
The formatted error message describing the current exception.
Gets the location path of the style sheet.
The location path of the style sheet.
